name: Northstar: Born Normal Trivia Game | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Jean-Paul Beaubier.

	Northstar once used "Jean-Paul Martin" as an alias, but he has always been Jean-Paul Beaubier.

questions.text: Northstar has a sister. What is her codename?
questions.explanation:
Aurora.

	Jeanne-Marie Beaubier has multiple personalities, which makes her an unstable and volatile force. Both Aurora and Northstar were members of Alpha Flight.

questions.text: Northstar has never been a member of which superhero group?
questions.explanation:
The Squadron Supreme.

	The Squadron Supreme do not exist in Marvel's normal timeline and thus, it is nearly impossible for Northstar to have been a member. Northstar has been a member of both Alpha Flight and the X-Men, and also served with the Secret Defenders for a while.

questions.text: In the Ultimate Marvel timeline, Northstar asked if Colossus was single.
questions.explanation:
True.

	When asked, Colossus was so surprised that he changed his skin to metal! They later went to Prom together, although that alienated Kurt Wagner, the Nightcrawler.

questions.text: What subject(s) did Northstar originally teach at Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters?
questions.explanation:
Business and Economy.

	Professor Charles Xavier offered these courses to Northstar, who originally declined. After being severely injured while transporting a mutant boy who unwillingly unleashed powerful explosions, Northstar accepted the offer.

questions.text: Northstar is a medal-winning athlete in this sport.
questions.explanation:
Skiing.

	He had to return his medals when it was discovered that he was a mutant and may have been unwittingly using his speed powers to give himself an edge on the competition.

questions.text: Northstar once was a member of a terrorist organization.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The terrorist group fought for Quebec's independence from the rest of Canada, but Northstar grew disenchanted with their violent tactics and renounced terrorism.

questions.text: Northstar adopted a baby named Johanna.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Northstar adopted a baby named Joanne who was HIV-positive. After she died from the illness, Northstar revealed to the public that he was gay.

questions.text: Which X-Man recruited Northstar for the X-Men?
questions.explanation:
Jean Grey.

	Jean Grey made up a ragtag band of X-Men to save Xavier from Magneto during the 'Eve of Destruction' storyline. Northstar fought alongside Omerta, who had super-strength and Wraith, who could turn his skin transparent.

questions.text: Northstar had his own group of students within the Institute. What were they called?
questions.explanation:
Alpha Squadron.

	Alpha Squadron was disbanded after Northstar's apparent death. One student, Anole, formed a special bond with his mentor, Northstar. Anole has the power to blend into his surroundings.
